main event: A witness observed a brightly flashing light in the sky that changed directions, hovered, and accelerated before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The object was observed moving in a straight line and at one point hovered., The object displayed a flashing blue/white light., Multiple witnesses were present at the location., The object was first seen at 6:45 p.m. and was visible until 8:45 p.m.
witness description: residents in the West Florence area
